attributes.action: Cancel Half Term School Holidays for schools that closed due to snow
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Half term week monday 16th Feb to Friday 20th Feb 2009 should now be cancelled due to school closures of the week monday 2nd Feb - Friday 6th Feb 2009 due to snow

Children are losing too much time in school especially those kids who are studing for GCSE's these net few months are crucial to them.
